app.name: TextNugs
app.description: Store and insert old English expressions.

scripts.text: Good heavens! Thou hath befuddled me once again!
scripts.title: Expression of Surprise

scripts.text: Prithee, spare me thy malodorous musings!
scripts.title: Expression of Disdain

scripts.text: Forsooth! A stroke of joy hath graced my heart!
scripts.title: Expression of Joy

scripts.text: Egad! What devilry is this that assails mine eyes?
scripts.title: Expression of Shock

scripts.text: Verily, I am most vexed by thy tomfoolery!
scripts.title: Expression of Annoyance

scripts.text: Hark! Methinks fortune doth favor me this day.
scripts.title: Expression of Good Fortune

scripts.text: Behold! A most wondrous sight unfolds before mine eyes.
scripts.title: Expression of Awe

scripts.text: Alas, I am undone by mine own folly!
scripts.title: Expression of Regret

scripts.text: Lo and behold! A marvel to behold indeed!
scripts.title: Expression of Amazement

scripts.text: Fie upon thee and thy knavish deeds!
scripts.title: Expression of Disapproval

scripts.text: What manner of sorcery is this, called '{{clipboard}}'? Surely, it is the work of a cunning enchanter!
scripts.title: Expression of Technological Befuddlement

scripts.text: Alas, {{clipboard}}, thou art as confounding as a maze within a labyrinth!
scripts.title: Expression of Confusion with a Person

scripts.text: Egad! Is this wondrous creation known as '{{clipboard}}' a gift from the heavens or a trap set by mischievous spirits?
scripts.title: Expression of Mixed Awe and Skepticism

scripts.text: Be it known, {{clipboard}}, thou art as baffling as the riddles of old!
scripts.title: Expression of Bafflement at a Person or Concept

scripts.text: Methinks '{{clipboard}}' is but a phantom of the mind, for such things cannot truly exist!
scripts.title: Expression of Denial about a Technology or Concept

scripts.text: Ah, {{clipboard}}, thy presence doth bring forth great mirth and merriment!
scripts.title: Expression of Joy upon Mentioning Someone

scripts.text: In sooth, {{clipboard}}, thou art as mysterious as the shadows at twilight!
scripts.title: Expression of Mystery

scripts.text: Hark! What strange contraption is this '{{clipboard}}'? Surely, it is the stuff of legends!
scripts.title: Expression of Surprise at Technology

scripts.text: Prithee, {{clipboard}}, dost thou mock me with thy perplexing nature?
scripts.title: Expression of Perplexity at a Concept or Person

scripts.text: Lo! I am truly flummoxed by '{{clipboard}}'! Such marvels surely lie beyond mortal understanding.
scripts.title: Expression of Awe and Confusion
